1. Press the camera button (bottom right)
2. Take image
3. Crop image
4. Analyze result
WARNING: No database is included in this version of the application. Additive marking will NOT work!
The application will NOT work without the Storage permission. You should change it by clicking on settings.
The OCR progress might take a few seconds. Please wait.

The result is displayed in the image below;
• The colored words (if any) represent additives.
• You can click on any of the words to view its details - in case of additives you will be able to see the additive's information.
• If the word was recognized wrongly, you can manually correct it.

This application is one of the products made for an undergraduate thesis. More specifically the thesis presents an example of the formal software engineering process. As such it consists of two parts - the software engineering documentation and the product - this application. It is worth noting, that this application is still in the prototype phase.
